text: The 1941 Manhattan Jaspers football team was an American football team that represented Manhattan College as an independent during the 1941 college football season. In its fourth season under head coach Herb Kopf, the team compiled a 4–4–1 record and was outscored by a total of 116 to 98. ==Schedule== ==References== Manhattan Category:Manhattan Jaspers football seasons Manhattan Jaspers football
title: 1941 Manhattan Jaspers football team
